use_cases_desc: Awareness of e.g. IM on secondary or tertiary display
evaluation: User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment); Deployment with users
contribution_desc:
The paper presents four visualisation techniques for assisting users in perceiving and tracking display changes in multi-display environments. The paper also present a markerless system to track attendance to displays based on off-the-self web cams, and a longitudinal study of the system used in regular work activities.
The results show that subtle visualisation techniques can positively change display attendence behavior.
contribution: Display/Visualization technique; Study (human factors); Study, deployment
crossdevice_def: "Modern computer workstation setups regularly include multiple displays in various configurations. With such multi- monitor or multi-display setups we have reached a stage where we have more display real-estate available than we are able to comfortably attend to."
